metadata.name: gift from grandma
metadata.description: Hello everyone  The auction item is my grandmother's amulet necklace.  The reason why I brought this necklace to open an auction to open an auction to receive this money to pay for the house deposited to the bank.  This necklace was my first gift to Grandma.  It was given to me before she left and the last gift she talked to me.  Before Grandma gave you this necklace.  Grandma told me that this necklace would protect her grandchildren and their loved ones.  This necklace is a good luck charm every time I  Apply for a job and carry it with you every time.  And every time the presentation will go well.  But with the situation of at home in the past, I lost my grandmother and lost my job at home.  Can't have money to spend at home  And my grandmother's funeral money, shortly after my grandmother's death.  I was also in a car accident which prevented me from working.It was Grandma's last item.can contact necklace
